name: Circuit Bricker
description:
If you have any issues with the game, I'd really appreciate it if you posted it in as much detail as you can over in my issue tracker on Github: https://github.com/Macrophage001/CircuitBricker-Issues/issues

Thanks!

Circuit Bricker is a simple, fun, light-show of a Breakout game.

Supports Android and Windows for the moment.

Check Devlog for Updates and Instructions

Note: On Android, some slowdown can occur if you exit the game and leave it running in the background. I am working on that but for now you can either quit the game by pressing back twice or remove from the background apps.
